title: I can't open league
body: When I click on the LOL desktop icon the logo will come up and shortly afterwards a notification saying "Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your Internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access." The notification says it's a RADS error. What should I do? Ty for any help available.

replies.body: It seems that your patcher is trying to launch and connect to the server, but something is blocking it.  I recommend using our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your OS is allowing access.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure other settings like your firewall.  This should restore access and get you in game!

Sounds like Firewall issue. Try this Riot Games automated tool:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

If it doesn't help, have a look there:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3
